welcome.title: Welcome to SkyMap
welcome.subtitle: Your personal window to the universe. Let us show you around!

explore.title: Explore the Sky
explore.description: Navigate the night sky in real-time

first-run-core.title: Core Quick Start
first-run-core.description: Essential controls to get you observing immediately.

module-discovery.title: Discovery Toolkit
module-discovery.description: Search and discovery workflows for tonight's sky.

module-planning.title: Planning Workflow
module-planning.description: Session planning, events, and observation tracking.

module-controls.title: Control Surface
module-controls.description: Navigation controls and display mode preferences.

module-settings-help.title: Settings & Help
module-settings-help.description: Settings drawer, shortcuts, and help resources.

hub.title: Tour Center
hub.description: Continue with module tours or restart any completed module.

skipReasons.unavailable: This feature is unavailable in your current environment and was skipped.
skipReasons.missing-selector: Guide target was not visible and this step was skipped.
skipReasons.hidden-by-platform: This feature is hidden on the current platform and was skipped.
skipReasons.unsupported-engine: This feature is unsupported for the current sky engine and was skipped.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Star Map
welcome.description: This is your interactive view of the night sky. You can drag to pan around, scroll to zoom, and click on objects to learn more about them.

search.title: Search for Objects
search.description: Click here to search for stars, planets, galaxies, nebulae, and more. Try searching for 'M31' (Andromeda Galaxy) or 'Mars'.

navigation.title: Navigate the Sky
navigation.description: Drag with your mouse to pan around the sky. On touch devices, use one finger to drag. The view follows real celestial coordinates.

zoom.title: Zoom Controls
zoom.description: Use these controls to zoom in and out. You can also use your mouse wheel or pinch-to-zoom on touch devices. The FOV (field of view) is shown at the bottom.

settings.title: Settings Panel
settings.description: Access all settings here: display options, equipment configuration, FOV simulator, and more. Customize the view to match your preferences.

fov.title: FOV Simulator
fov.description: Visualize your camera's field of view on the sky. Configure your telescope and camera to see exactly what you'll capture in your images.

shotlist.title: Shot List
shotlist.description: Plan your imaging session by adding targets to your shot list. Track progress and manage your observation queue for the night.

tonight.title: Tonight's Picks
tonight.description: Get personalized recommendations for the best objects to observe tonight based on your location and current sky conditions.

contextmenu.title: Right-Click Menu
contextmenu.description: Right-click (or long-press on mobile) anywhere on the sky to access quick actions: add markers, copy coordinates, add to target list, and more.

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.description: You've completed the tour. Explore the universe at your own pace! You can restart this tour anytime from the Settings menu.

sky-atlas.title: Sky Atlas
sky-atlas.description: Open curated atlas targets to jump quickly between popular regions.

quick-actions.title: Quick Actions
quick-actions.description: Use one-click shortcuts for common framing and navigation tasks.

navigation-history.title: Navigation History
navigation-history.description: Move backward and forward through previous views.

view-bookmarks.title: View Bookmarks
view-bookmarks.description: Save and return to favorite sky positions and FOV states.

session-planner.title: Session Planner
session-planner.description: Plan nightly targets, constraints, and sequence priorities.

astro-events.title: Astronomy Events
astro-events.description: Review upcoming celestial events relevant to your location.

astro-calculator.title: Astronomy Calculator
astro-calculator.description: Open the calculation workspace for ephemeris and observation math.

equipment-manager.title: Equipment Manager
equipment-manager.description: Manage telescope and camera presets for realistic simulation.

exposure.title: Exposure Calculator
exposure.description: Estimate exposure settings using instrument and target conditions.

observation-log.title: Observation Log
observation-log.description: Record completed observations and notes while you work.

markers.title: Sky Markers
markers.description: Place and manage temporary markers directly on the sky view.

location.title: Location Controls
location.description: Manage observing sites and switch quickly between saved locations.

satellite.title: Satellite Tracker
satellite.description: Track satellite passes and visibility windows.

ocular.title: Ocular Simulator
ocular.description: Preview eyepiece framing and magnification behavior.

plate-solver.title: Plate Solver
plate-solver.description: Solve image coordinates and synchronize mount alignment.

mount.title: Mount Controls
mount.description: Connect and control mount actions from the starmap interface.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Switch between visual themes for your workspace.

language.title: Language
language.description: Change UI language and localization options.

night-mode.title: Night Mode
night-mode.description: Enable red-filter mode to preserve dark adaptation.

keyboard-shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboard-shortcuts.description: Open shortcut reference to speed up frequent actions.

about.title: About
about.description: Check version, credits, and project information.

daily-knowledge.title: Daily Knowledge
daily-knowledge.description: Open the daily astronomy insight panel to read, save favorites, and jump to related objects.

softGuard.title: Continue Without Full Setup?
softGuard.locationImpact: Skipping location setup can reduce recommendation and visibility accuracy.
softGuard.equipmentImpact: Skipping equipment setup can reduce FOV and imaging simulation accuracy.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.subtitle: Let's set up your SkyMap

mobile.compactBottomBarDesc: Use prioritized tools with a More drawer instead of showing every tool at once.

mobile.prioritizedToolsDesc: Visible tools appear first in compact mode. Hidden tools remain available from More.

feedback.title: Send Feedback

feedback.typeFeatureHint: Use this for improvements and new capabilities.

feedback.additionalPlaceholder: Anything else that may help (workarounds, notes, links).
feedback.includeSystemInfoDesc: OS, architecture, app/runtime versions, browser context.
feedback.includeLogsDesc: Attach latest logs with sensitive fields redacted.
feedback.privacyHint: Diagnostics are optional and only included when you enable them.

suggestions.meridianFlip: Ensure meridian flip is enabled in mount driver

suggestions.decLimit: This target is outside your mount's declination range
suggestions.belowHorizon: Wait for target to rise higher or adjust minimum altitude

suggestions.cableWrap: Consider reversing sequence direction or adding a park between targets
suggestions.pierCollision: Use pause-before-meridian setting for long telescope tubes
suggestions.slewThroughPole: Consider reordering targets to avoid pole crossing

planRec.addMoreTargets: Consider adding more targets to fill the night

tonightRec.lowSB: Low surface brightness — needs dark skies

hero.description: A powerful astronomy application for stargazing, observation planning, and astrophotography. Discover celestial objects, plan your sessions, and capture the night sky.
hero.openSourceFree: Free & Open Source · Cross-platform Desktop App

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for astronomical observation and astrophotography planning

stellarium.title: Stellarium Engine
stellarium.description: Realistic sky rendering with billions of stars, deep sky objects, and solar system bodies

planning.title: Observation Planning
planning.description: Plan your observing sessions with altitude charts, twilight times, and moon phase analysis

shotList.title: Shot List
shotList.description: Manage your imaging targets with priority ordering and session scheduling

fovSimulator.title: FOV Simulator
fovSimulator.description: Visualize your camera and telescope field of view with mosaic planning

tonight.title: Tonight's Picks
tonight.description: Get personalized recommendations for the best objects to observe tonight

coordinates.title: Coordinate System
coordinates.description: Full support for equatorial and horizontal coordinate systems with precise calculations

equipment.title: Equipment Profiles
equipment.description: Save and manage your telescope, camera, and filter configurations

i18n.title: Multi-language
i18n.description: Full support for English and Chinese with more languages coming soon

gettingStarted.title: Get Started in Minutes
gettingStarted.subtitle: Three simple steps to begin your astronomical journey

launch.title: Launch the App
launch.description: Open SkyMap in your browser or download the desktop app for Windows, macOS, or Linux.

setup.title: Set Your Location
setup.description: Configure your observation site and equipment profiles for accurate sky rendering.

observe.title: Start Observing
observe.description: Explore the night sky, plan sessions, and capture stunning astrophotography targets.

screenshots.title: See It in Action
screenshots.subtitle: Explore the intuitive interface designed for astronomers

starmap.label: Star Map
starmap.caption: Interactive star map with real-time sky rendering

fov.label: FOV
fov.caption: Field of view simulation with mosaic support

tech.title: Built with Modern Technology
tech.subtitle: Leveraging the latest web and desktop technologies for the best experience
tech.engineDescription: The world's most accurate open-source planetarium software

testimonials.title: Loved by Astronomers
testimonials.subtitle: See what our community has to say about SkyMap

astronomer.name: Alex Chen
astronomer.quote: SkyMap has completely transformed my observation sessions. The planning tools and real-time sky rendering make it so easy to find and track objects.

photographer.name: Sarah Mitchell
photographer.quote: The FOV simulator and mosaic planning features are incredible. I can plan my entire imaging session before I even set up my telescope.

beginner.name: David Park
beginner.quote: As a beginner, SkyMap made astronomy accessible. The tonight's picks feature always gives me something amazing to look at.

cta.title: Start Your Astronomical Journey
cta.description: Whether you're a beginner or an experienced astronomer, SkyMap has everything you need to explore the night sky.

footer.description: A modern astronomy application for stargazing and observation planning.
footer.reportIssueTooltip: Report a bug or request a feature

dailyKnowledge.title: Daily Knowledge
dailyKnowledge.subtitle: A curated daily astronomy insight inspired by KStars and Stellarium workflows.
dailyKnowledge.videoEntry: Video entry. Use Open Source to view the original video.
dailyKnowledge.fallbackNotice: This entry is shown in fallback language for accuracy.
